metadata.prompt: A gloved hand spraying a disinfectant on a clean countertop. The shot is dynamic, with the spray catching the light.
A close-up on the back of a disinfectant bottle, with the words "CONTACT TIME: 10 MINUTES" highlighted by a glowing animated circle.
A shot of a person spraying a surface and immediately wiping it with a paper towel. A giant, red, animated 'X' appears over the image with the text "NO! Don't wipe yet!".
A shot of a stylist setting a cool, modern digital timer on their station next to a freshly sprayed, wet surface. The timer reads "10:00".
A time-lapse style animation showing the timer counting down while animated germs on the wet surface are slowly zapped out of existence.
The timer hits "00:00" and a gloved hand comes in and confidently wipes the now-disinfected surface dry with a clean cloth. The surface sparkles.
